# `RecordingWheelPickerItem` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| id | `string` | No | Unique identifier for the wheel picker item. |
| title | `string` | No | The main text displayed for the item. |
| value | `string` | No | The value of the item |
| isSelected | `boolean` | No | Indicates if the item is selected by end customer. |
